machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G90 ; switch to absolute coordinate mode
T3 ; select the mirror tool
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;Start heating bed
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;Start heating extruder
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;Wait for bed to reach temp before proceeding
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;Wait for extruder to reach temp before proceeding
G1 F18000 Y-160 Z15 ; move fast to the coordinates
G1 F18000 X0 Z0.3 ; move fast to the coordinates
G92 E0 ; set the extruders to 0
G1 F300 X60 E24 ; purge the hotends
G1 F600 X40 ; swipe the nozzles
G1 F600 Z3 ; perform Z hop
